titleStmt.title: A loyal tear dropt on the vault of our late martyred sovereign in an anniversary sermon on the day of his murther.
titleStmt.author: Glanvill, Joseph, 1636-1680.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Cotes, and are to be sold by James Collins ...,

notesStmt.note: Caption title: A fast sermon on the kings myrtyrdom.
Attributed to Joseph Glanvill. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
